thread.title: With same core, Chicago Bulls hope new voice is difference

title: With same core, Chicago Bulls hope new voice is difference
text:
> Top News With same core, Chicago Bulls hope new voice is difference Chicago Bulls forward Doug McDermott, right, shoots against New Orleans Pelicans forward Luke Babbitt, left, during the second half of an NBA preseason basketball game, Monday, Oct. 12, 2015, in Chicago. The Pelicans won 123-115. (AP Photo/Kamil Krzaczynski) iWitness7 is your chance to join the News Center 7 team! Upload your videos and photos and share with the entire WHIO-TV community!
